title: My account was stolen... How can I get it back...
body: I want to sell my account and he stolen my account... now I just want  my account back... how can I do that...

replies.body:
To be clear, selling (as well as trading, gifting or otherwise sharing) of accounts is a direct breach of the [Terms of Use](https://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/legal/termsofuse), and you should avoid getting involved in such as there can be serious consequences.

As for recovering the account, you will need to submit an Account Recovery ticket to [Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) (choose the "Recover my account" option, you will need to ensure you are logged out) and they will help with recovery of the account.
